content:
This chunk is part of an `sphinx` documentation configuration file (`conf.py`) that sets up various options for how URLs are displayed in the generated documentation, disables specific features in the Texinfo output, configures which domains to ignore during link checks, and defines intersphinx mappings for API references.

# How to display URL addresses: 'footnote', 'no', or 'inline'.
#texinfo_show_urls = 'footnote'

# If true, do not generate a @detailmenu in the "Top" node's menu.
#texinfo_no_detailmenu = False

# When running the linkcheck, don't try any example.net/org/com domains.
linkcheck_ignore = [r'https?://(.+\.)?example\.(com|net|org)(/.*)?',
                    'http://server:port/path']
linkcheck_anchors = False

# Intersphinx config.
intersphinx_mapping = {'python': ('https://docs.python.org/3', None)}
